body:
You can do that right?
```
>>> a = torch.randn(10) < 0
>>> a

 1
 0
 1
 0
 0
 0
 0
 0
 1
 1
[torch.ByteTensor of size 10]

>>> 1-a

 0
 1
 0
 1
 1
 1
 1
 1
 0
 0
[torch.ByteTensor of size 10]
```

That being said, you are correct that numpy allows it:
```
>>> -np.uint8(2)
254
>>> np.negative(np.uint8(2))
254
```
